column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place was DELICIOUS. Like stunningly so. The pizza was perfect
column2: and the crust was to die for. Our waiter was really cool
column3: and very attentive despite being swamped. The wait was a bit long
column4: so we opted to sit outside despite the fact it was a little chilly. Overall
column5: an amazing introduction to Chicago deep dish.
